Package com.example.easycooking.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateRecipeActivity
    This is a CreateRcipeActivtiy View class That allow user to creat a new recipe and upload image, ingredient and steps and insert them into database, and a object Recipe passed among activities.
    CustomSearchActivity
    not used
    DisplayModifyImageActivity
    This activity contains a galleryflow which is rebuild by myself.
    MainPageActivity
    This is the MainPageActivity.Like the home_page.
    ModifyImageActivity
    The main goal of this activity is to take photos and display them In this page, user have choice of taking photo and saving photo if user wants to take photo, activity will jump the the camera App which is build in android system After taking photo, user have the choice to save, retake and cancel.
    ModifyIngredientsActivity
    This is the ModifyIngredientsActivity View It let User add the ingredents and set amount also let user to modify an exist recipes' ingredients.
    ModifyStepsActivity
    This a View to set the description of a recipe
    MyProfileActivity
    This activity is aim to classify all the recipe in the local database We can get all the recipes we created or modifrid from others We can get all the recipes we downloaded We can get all the recipes we have already uploaded We can get all the recipes in the local database
    QueryMyIngredientsActivity
    This activity contains a checkbox listview which contains all the ingredients on hand.
    RecipeResultActivity
    This is the View class that show all the recipe with the recipe name By the given ArrayList of Recipe object.
    SelectionLocalActivity
    This activity is a local recipe details show User can see all the images, ingredients, steps in this pages On the menu users are allowed to modify this recipe,share this recipe,upload this recipe, And delete this recipe
    SelectionWebActivity
    This activity is used to show the web source recipe It displays the images,ingredients and the steps User can download this recipe or share this recipe by the mail application
